name: Aatxe
description: The Aatxe is a large celestial being with a strong physical presence. It possesses impressive horns and hooves, aligning with its role as a guardian. Its lawful good nature drives it to protect others.
memorable: The Aatxe's ability to charge at enemies, read surface thoughts, and resist magical effects make it a formidable foe and a powerful ally.
goals: To act as a guardian and protector, engaging in combat to defend allies and intimidate foes.
relations: It may serve celestial beings or deities, sharing common goals of protection and righteousness.
environment: Typically found in areas that align with its lawful good nature, such as heavenly realms or locations of great importance.
strengths: High strength and constitution, capable of dealing significant melee damage while withstanding attacks.
weaknesses: Average dexterity, affecting its speed and agility compared to other creatures.
attacks: Gore attack dealing significant piercing damage and can knock targets prone, in addition to a frightening ability affecting nearby enemies.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to charge, allowing it to deal extra damage and potentially knock foes prone.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and Intimidation, demonstrating its physical prowess and capacity for intimidation.
additional_information: Immune to being charmed and frightened.
Can polymorph into a Medium male humanoid.
Has magic resistance, gaining advantage on saving throws against spells.
Possesses legendary actions for tactical advantages.
Can read surface thoughts of creatures, providing strategic insight.
